segments.text: Jessie , I ’ m afraid I can ’ t come back home for dinner tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not back home for dinner again ? That ’ s the third time this week !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . Our company has just opened . There are always too many things to handle . You know that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don ’ t have to explain . Suit yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I apologize . You have my word , I ’ ll spend some time with you on the weekend . I promise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for understanding . I promise I ’ ll make it up to you .
segments.speaker: S1
